name: Box Pusher
description:
This simple sokoban style game player need push different color boxes to destined locations. Every color goes to same colored goals. So red box to red goal box.
Match the box colors to goal colors complete the level. Try to move as little as possible, as fast as possible and collect as many coins as you can
There is save system which save and register player fastest time, steps taken and collected coins. Also when finished level next level will be unlocked. 16 different levels

Features:

- 5 different colors boxes
- 16 levels with unlocked level system
- Steam achievements
- Collect coins
- score and time system
